name: Dy22w07and08 Brackeys Game Jam
description:
Brackeys Game Jam - "It Is Not Real"

I participated on this 1 week game jam and due current crisis in Ukraine, I couldn't help but process it on my own way.

Game is simple and playable, although it might require some time to figure out what to do, as i wanted to leave room for players imagination and creativity. There is no winning condition, except for perhaps in players mind. Please let me know your thoughts if you play it short or long.

Buttons:

WASD - movement

Mouse - look around

E - pick up / place down

Esc - quit game

I spent this week about twice of my normal amount of hours, so i created content worth of two normal weeks for me. Total hours: ~20h. No graphics or sound done by me, only blueprints and building in UE. Music by awesome Finnish indie artist and songwriter Uinu: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuKQgUz-ikIKq4OPo6JpxZQ

Asset credits from UE Marketplace:

Light Foliage by MYTHRA TECH

Landscape Stamps by W3 Studios

Meadow – Environment Set by NatureManufacture

Cemetery – VOL.1 by Dekogon Studios

Footsteps Sounds with Blueprint Setup by Bartosz Kamol Kaminski
